text: This is a list of colleges and universities in South Dakota: ==Public== *Black Hills State University *Dakota State University *Northern State University *Oglala Lakota College *Sinte Gleska University *South Dakota School of Mines and Technology *South Dakota State University *University of South Dakota ==Private== *Augustana College *Dakota Wesleyan University *Mount Marty College *National American University *Presentation College *University of Sioux Falls ==References== * Category:Lists of colleges and universities
title: Colleges and universities in South Dakota
